00024 #ifndef _BSA_FILE_H_
00025 #define _BSA_FILE_H_

00033 
00037 class BSAFile
00038 {
00039  public:
00040 
00042   struct FileStruct
00043   {
00044     // File size and offset in file. We store the offset from the
00045     // beginning of the file, not the offset into the data buffer
00046     // (which is what is stored in the archive.)
00047     uint32_t fileSize, offset;
00048 
00049     // Zero-terminated file name
00050     char* name;
00051   };
00052 
00053   typedef std::vector<FileStruct> FileList;
00054 
00055  private:
00056 
00058   Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr input;
00059 
00061   FileList files;
00062 
00064   std::vector<char> stringBuf;
00065 
00067   bool isLoaded;
00068 
00070   std::string filename;
00071 
00073   struct iltstr
00074   {
00075     bool operator()(const char *s1, const char *s2) const
00076     { return strcasecmp(s1,s2) < 0; }
00077   };
00078 
00083   typedef std::map<const char*, int, iltstr> Lookup;
00084   Lookup lookup;
00085 
00087   void fail(const std::string &msg);
00088 
00090   void readHeader();
00091 
00093   int getIndex(const char *str);
00094 
00095  public:
00096 
00097   /* -----------------------------------
00098    * BSA management methods
00099    * -----------------------------------
00100    */
00101 
00102   BSAFile()
00103     : input(), isLoaded(false) {}
00104 
00106   void open(const std::string &file);
00107 
00111   void open(Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr inp, const std::string &name);
00112 
00113   /* -----------------------------------
00114    * Archive file routines
00115    * -----------------------------------
00116    */
00117 
00119   bool exists(const char *file) { return getIndex(file) != -1; }
00120 
00127   Mangle::Stream::StreamPtr getFile(const char *file);
00128 
00130   const FileList &getList() const
00131     { return files; }
00132 };
